repo.name: LeOS - Full UnGoogled Apps
repo.description: This repo includes ungoogled Apps without trackers. The Apps are forks. Some apps have only design changes, some have removed google sh..t, some have removed trackers and some have it all""

apps.name: LeOS-AppVault
apps.summary: With LeOS-AppVault you can set a Pin/Pattern/Fingerprint lock for every app. You can hide contacts, Notes, pictures or videos. You should always leave the app with back button. Contacts= If you create a contect direct in the app, it's has only limited fields and you can edit them Videos= Once in Vault, ever in Vault. No way to delete You should lock SETTINGS in the app to prevend uninstalling the app. If you are using ClassyShark, you will find 12 Trackers (most are adds 'tracker'). I haven't removed them all because I have restricted the Internet access. So the trackers can't download any add or upload any collected data. I will work on removing the trackers. Stay tuned  ---- LeOS-AppVault is a fork of yoosinpaddy/CalculatorVault

apps.name: LeOS-Calculator
apps.summary: Simple Material Design Calculator

apps.name: LeOS-Cloud (no public usage)
apps.summary: This app is only working with my personal cloud. The cloud is not public. But if someone need a webapp for his personal Cloud, please let me know, I can build the WebApp  !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

apps.name: LeOSMalwareScanner
apps.summary: The App is based  on Hypatia, the worlds first FOSS malware scanner for Android. It is powered by ClamAV style signature databases.
